about-me.paragraph-1: I am a 21 years old Colombian who dreams of becoming a SOFTWARE DEVELOPER.
about-me.paragraph-2: I am passionate about software development, and I love learning new things, so I am always looking for new opportunities to continue growing as a professional.
about-me.paragraph-3: I have a diverse skill set, ranging from the basics of Front-End design with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript in conjunction with the React.js library to backend development with Java and JavaScript with Node.js (Express.js)
